data.message:
Hi!
I had a local sport page "top sport - ورزش برتر" the page had several admins but one admin posted a troll post ، i don't know who reported This troll post to your company and with out research and advise ، facebook blocked my page !

It's not fair !
My page had a bout 5000 members and how you think to remove or block a page or a profile by only one or two report?

Please answer what should i do ?
Is it posible to repair?

replies.message: Hi there. If you believe your page has been blocked or unpublished by mistake, you can make an appeal here: http://bit.ly/2tMleHC. Thank you! -Caitlin
Hello how can I do my Facebook page i can't recover it its unpublished page I can't use it anymore.. Please help... Highly appreciated... Thank you so much

Facebook я хотела бы попросить изменить место личных  сообщений.  когда я смотрю ленту, и что-то пишу там,  выскакивает окно сообщений, которое мешает писать,  нужно обязательно реагировать. иногда человек пишет короткими фразами,  и нужно сидеть,  и кликать, чтобы убрать его)))  спасибо

I lost my 14yr old grandaughter this year and her best friend who has helped my family and I thru some hard times her name is Shane Davis and has been kicked off Facebook twice recently for no reason ! She hasn't said anything untrue! A woman who has done nothing but stalk, steal photos, steal from my grandaughters, Taylor Galloway and Amber Thoma's charity she's made false claims against Shane while still posting photos of her on her Facebook the woman's name is Missie Szentes my daughter and Ambers mother have had to block her. I would really appreciate it if you would put Shane back on Facebook she's only 14 and I only get to talk to her thru Facebook or text she's moved to Tennessee please! Thank You❤️
I am disabled and don't get out much I would appreciate your help soon.
Please, something went wrong with my FB...Could you please help me with that...Thanks...RamRamonita Arroyo
Could you please, something was wrong with my FB..Help me please...

Hi.
Sir My fb account is hacked. Or no.
its can't loging in.
it ask me for my number which I use to make fb account, and the truth is that I forgot mu number.
So please tell me how I log into my account?.
If It's possible.
